John Beltran feat. Open House - Earth & Nightfall

Saturday, February 16, 2013

Disheartened with a lot of the current music out there, I find myself turning to the past and searching out the classics. This is one such classic from Detroit by John Beltram called Earth & Nightfall, featuring Open House. A piece of deep, moody, electronic beauty.

Check out more at http://www.discogs.com/John-Beltran-Featuring-Open-House-Earth-Nightfall/master/5772

Various ‎– The Deepest Shade Of Techno I+II

Comments

Techno - The Way They Used To

Saturday, February 16, 2013

A selection of old classic techno records re-discovered in my garage. Mixed with love on two Technics 1210s and my hand built rotary mixer. 09/11/12

Techno - The Way They Used To // Mixed by Darce by Darcy on Mixcloud

Tracklist:
Chaser - Blue Planet - Soma
Dan Curtin presents The Undefined - Cascade (Dawn mix) Strictly Rhythm
Nighttrax - The Search for Home - White Label
EBE - Neural Response Ep - Hubble - Soma
Pacou - Fireball - Tresor
Box Blaze and Deetron Skin - Thight Inches Volume 2 - View
Johannes Heil - Doctrine of Creation - Kanzleramt
Surgeon - Electronically Tested Ep - Machine Language- Downwards
Dreamsequence 111 feat: Blake Baxter. FM disko - Weompi - Tresor
Blakkat - Blakkat mix - Bush
Technasia - Fusin - Music-Man Records
The Porn Headquarters - Our Business Ep - Madness - Primary
Sharan & Youssef - 2 of Us - Into the Groove - Prolekult
Deetron - Alien Entertainment Ep - Decipher Language - Intec
Deetron - Dolls for a Diva Ep - Breakdown - Intec
Bryan Zentz - International Ep - Motorkat - Intec
Andrew McLauchlan - Love Story Reedit - Bush

http://www.mixcloud.com/darcy/

Art Sci-Fi Mashup

johnmattos.com

Dave Seeley invokes Michelangelo’s Pietá in this Star Wars book cover.

Larry Bertlemann

Wednesday, February 13, 2013

Wish I was a 70's child, the surfing was fresh and radical and the music was amazing! This is a clip from a North Shore standout Larry Bertlemann who was known for his low, compact turns and explosive above the lip re-entries called "Larry-als," He has been credited by the Dogtown crew as the single most influential person on their skating.

Larry Bertlemann 16mm Shredding - Sea Movies
